bug.author: prisae
bug.description:
I just tried to create a minimal environment.yml for a project in which I also have GemPy. Having: <denchmark-code>name: gallery
channels: - defaults - conda-forge dependencies: - ... all my conda dependencies - pip: - gempy </denchmark-code>
did not work. Turns out that it was missing nptyping nptyping is specified in gempy/requirements.txt, but it is missing in gempy/setup.py. I think it should be included in the setup file.

comments.comment: yes, we screwed in the last patch. I am already preparing a hotfix that will go live this week. Thank you for the contribution!
